title: Symptoms Of Covid-19
content:
Feeling Sick?
Stay home and away from others
(including people you live with who are not sick) if you have symptoms that aren't better explained by another cause.
Seek health care promptly for testing and/or treatment if you have
risk factors for severe illness
;
treatment
may help lower your risk of severe illness.
When to seek emergency help
Look for emergency warning signs* for COVID 19:
Trouble breathing
Persistent pain or pressure in the chest
New confusion
Inability to wake or stay awake
